title: Spell Side Effects
description: Explore the physical side effects of classic fantasy spells like Light, Force Missile, and Fireball. Sure, a fireball can blast your enemies apart. But it can also ignite wood, or turn water to steam.

title: Exploration Rewards
description: Reap rewards for exploring the world. Discover not only vistas, but actual content as well. Every corner you turn will hold something, whether it's a hidden puzzle, a key to the narrative, or an easter egg.

title: Unique Puzzles
description: Solve a unique puzzle every time. Rather than multiple iterations of the same puzzle over and over with increasing difficulty, we believe that each puzzle should be unique and challenging.
